headline: President Trump’s team began putting in place tighter security measures as shock and anger reverberated through the White House following the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk

Signs of weakness in China’s economy stretched into August, adding pressure on Beijing to step up efforts to stimulate near-term growth
